title: 04 Ka-Zar v2 (1997 - 1998)
description:
This torrent contains Marvel Comics Ka-Zar v2 published from 1997 - 1998.

This series was the fourth solo series published with Lord Kevin Plunder as Ka-Zar. However it was the second series published with the title "Ka-Zar" without any further modifier to the title (Lord of the Hidden Jungle, The Savage, etc.). This torrent includes issues 1-20, Annual #1 and the Marvel Flashback issue.

This title became entwined with the Thanos storyline occurring during the time of its publication and thus brought the heroes from the Savage Land once more into the civilized (more or less)world.

Also in this torrent are two Ka-Zar one-shot stories that were published since the Ka-Zar the Savage series ended.

Thanks to the scanners, the Chronological Thanos and to the shiverman who contributed in a major way to the completion of this torrent.

Please seed. Please enjoy.
